This update includes various enhancements and fixes for the app. Performance for documents with complex forms has been improved; the eraser is now much smoother; document sharing and opening issues have been fixed; and a lot more.

version_name: 2.0.2 contains stability improvements and bug fixes:* The new checkpoint saving offers an effective recovery mechanism to restore unsaved changes in case of a crash.* Improves file exporting for iOS 11.* Improves global search results.* Improves state res

version_description:
PDF Viewer 2.0 takes full advantage of iOS 11 and has deep support for Drag and Drop. Drag in files to copy or move them into folders. You can even drag images and text directly into a PDF or select text and drag it to other apps, like Notes.
